item.title: Mach/Airspeed Indicators – Mach Indicators – Both Inoperative

numlitem.para: Aircraft remains at or below FL300, and
A placard with this limitation is affixed to instrument panel.
Limit flight altitude to FL300 or below.

placard.para: Placard both Mach/Airspeed Indicators "MACH INOP – ALT RESTRICTED TO FL300" and enter item in Aircraft Deferred Item Log.
